lead_paragraph: GIOVANNIELLO--Margaret Montgomery Torr, of Cedarhurst on January 17, 2016. Devoted wife, mother, attorney, administrative law judge and bar association leader. Born on May 23, 1927, in Terre Haute, Indiana, a graduate of the University of Wisconsin and Brooklyn Law School. After marriage to husband Joseph on June 10, 1951, they attended law school together at night while working full-time, then practiced law as Giovanniello & Giovanniello. Later, an administrative law judge with the New York State Department of Labor, she was a leader of the bar, serving as president of the Brooklyn Women's Bar Association, the New York Association of Administrative Law Judges and the National Association of Administrative Law Judiciary. Judge Giovanniello is survived by her sister Helen Exton; four sons: Rocco, Raymond, Joseph Jr., and Earle and six grandchildren, Lauren, Ray Jr., Rachel, Daniel, Sarah and Elizabeth. Family will receive friends at Flinch & Bruns Funeral Home, 34 Hempstead Avenue, Lynbrook, NY, Wednesday, January 20, 2016 from 2-4 and 7-9pm. Interment St. Charles Cemetery, Farmingdale on Thursday, January 21, 2016 at 11am. For further information, please visit www.flinchand bruns.com. 1/3
